Message.Title: "Blue Horseshoe Likes Bonanza Goldfields"
Message.Msg: Bonanza Goldfields, BONZ, is a junior gold mining start-up company with tremendous potential. The new C.E.O. was a director at the U.S. Mint. Financing secured. Gold production will begin at the company's Tarantula site soon. Read the recent Yahoo news. 300-500% upside over the next 90 days is possible. "Penny stock today. Dollar stock tomorrow."

Thanks for that! I was wondering how I could be so off. Sorry! So, I guess that means that guidance for next quarter is about in-line to slightly lower: 0.675 versus 0.68 or about -0.7% lower. GL

Message.Title: EBAY beats,revamps, and adds growth to bottom line , cant get better than that on expectation factor guys
Message.Msg: pay pal and new mobile apps already kicking in look for BLOW OUT next qtr. :) even Target decided to download EBAY apps :) count your Targets

Analysts? I am an analyst, you are an analyst and my next door neighbor is an analyst. I've only been doing this for a short time and have already learned most people on these boards know less than I do and analysts are not to be trusted. I know Christmas is coming and I will buy on any dip here. Unless those numbers showed something extraordinary yesterday bad or good they will mean nothing in the next three months. Imo

Their guidance is just being conservative. EBAY is the best stock to own. Both their PayPal and marketplace business are booming. Year to year earnings and revenue growth are the best among companies. If you want to short something, go to short AMZN. While AMZN is switching to central distribution, EBAY is using marketplace to organize an army of small vendors to take Amazon market share. Also Dan Niles and Goldman Sachs can't be wrong. EBAY is the best of the best. I see EBAY is the new AAPL. I see $100 a share soon.

Message.Title: Beware Ebay newbies sellers ** Paypal is holding your payment money for 21 days
Message.Msg: If you need cash for this Christmas, sell on craigslist. Quick cash and you don't have to pay 15% fees to Ebay and Paypal.

Message.Title: Ebay buyer protection is nothing but to protect Ebay & Paypal fees
Message.Msg: I was unlucky to buy too many items not as described lately. After I returned some bad items for my full refund, Ebay sent me a warning and they removed all of the negative feedback I gave to bad sellers in last 12 months. Ebay & Paypal are on the side of bad sellers.
